listeningQuestion.question: Why does Joe Sanders always win the garden competition?
listeningQuestion.translation: 为什么乔·桑德斯总是赢得花园比赛？

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个关于花园比赛的有趣故事，重点学习形容词和副词的比较级和最高级用法，以及every的合成词用法。故事展现了不同园丁的不同特点和态度。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Joe Sanders has the most beautiful garden in our town.
Nearly everybody enters for 'The Nicest Garden Competition' each year, but Joe wins every time.
Bill Frith's garden is larger than Joe's.
Bill works harder than Joe and grows more flowers and vegetables, but Joe's garden is more interesting.
He has made neat paths and has built a wooden bridge over a pool.
I like gardens too, but I do not like hard work.
Every year I enter for the garden competition too, and I always win a little prize for the worst garden in the town!

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 乔·桑德斯拥有我们镇上最漂亮的花园。
几乎每个人都参加每年举办的'最佳花园竞赛'，而每次都是乔获胜。
比尔·弗里斯的花园比乔的花园大。
他比乔也更为勤奋，种植的花卉和蔬菜也更多，但乔的花园更富有情趣。
他修筑了一条条整洁的小路，并在一个池塘上架了一座小木桥。
我也喜欢花园，但我却不愿意辛勤劳动。
每年的花园竞赛我也参加，但总因是镇上最劣的花园而获得一个小奖！

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.toggle: adj. 整齐的，整洁的，井井有条的
examples: tidy up the room - 整理房间

notes.title: 形容词和副词的比较级和最高级
content: 单音节词和少数双音节词在词尾加-er，-est
不规则变化：good/well(better, best), bad/ill(worse, worst)
最高级前通常要加定冠词the

notes.title: every构成的合成词
content: every和each的区别：every强调整体，each强调个体

notes.title: enter和enter for的用法
content: enter for + 比赛/考试：报名参加

notes.example: Joe wins every time in the competition.

multipleChoice.question: Why does Joe always win the competition?
options: Because his garden is the largest
Because his garden is the most interesting
Because he grows the most flowers
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到Joe's garden is more interesting，这是他获胜的关键

multipleChoice.explanation: 文中明确提到Bill Frith's garden is larger than Joe's

multipleChoice.question: The writer wins a prize for ___.
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到作者总是因为最差的花园而获得小奖

notes.title: 英国园艺文化
notes.content: 园艺在英国文化中占有重要地位。许多英国人都有自己的花园，并以此为傲。花园比赛是英国社区文化的重要组成部分，既促进了邻里交流，也推动了园艺技术的发展。

notes.title: 园艺设计理念
notes.content: 一个好的花园不仅在于其大小和植物的数量，更重要的是整体的设计和趣味性。如Joe的花园，通过小路和木桥的设计，创造出了更有趣的园景。
